thread.title: On the Steelers: At 37, James Harrison could stack up his play against most any linebacker of any age
thread.title_full: On the Steelers: At 37, James Harrison could stack up his play against most any linebacker of any age

title: On the Steelers: At 37, James Harrison could stack up his play against most any linebacker of any age
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Steelers - Today 
There are 55 men who played in the NFL past their 40th birthday. Only two were linebackers....
